com.device.service.rest.api

Interface IUserAccessServiceAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserAccessServiceAPIImpl

    public interface IUserAccessServiceAPI
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Detail

      • generateAccessRequest

        UserAccessServiceResponse generateAccessRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                              ConnectionManagerImpl.RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                              ConnectionManagerImpl.ContentType contentType,
                                              java.lang.String appID,
                                              java.lang.String appSessionID,
                                              java.lang.String requestAuthenticator,
                                              java.lang.String userServiceSessionID,
                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> data,
                                              javax.crypto.SecretKey kerberosAppServiceSessionKey,
                                              javax.crypto.SecretKey appSessionKey,
                                              javax.crypto.SecretKey userSessionKey)
                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                       RestClientException
        Parameters:
        url: - String url of the web service being accessed
        requestMethod: - Request Method of the request
        contentType: - Content Type of the request
        appID: - String appLoginName
        appSessionID: - String sessionID for the app created by the service being invoked
        requestAuthenticator: - String Authenticator for the request
        userServiceSessionID: - String sessionID for the user created by the service being invoked
        data: - Map data to be send with the request to the service
        kerberosAppServiceSessionKey: - SecretKey made using the kerberos Service Session ID
        appSessionKey: - SecretKey created using the AppSessionID
        userSessionKey: - SecretKey created using the AppSessionID
        Returns:
        AccessServiceResponse or null if the input parameter are invalid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RestClientException

      • processAccessResponse

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> processAccessResponse(java.lang.String requestAuthenticatorStr,
                                                                     java.lang.String encResponseAuthenticator,
                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> encData,
                                                                     AppSession appSession,
                                                                     UserSession userSession,
                                                                     javax.crypto.SecretKey userSessionKey)
                                                                       throws ResponseDecryptionException,
                                                                              InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException
        Parameters:
        requestAuthenticatorStr: - String request authenticator
        encResponseAuthenticator: - String encrypted response authenticator
        encData: - Map encrypted response data
        appSession: - AppSession for the service being invoked
        userSession: - UserSession for the service being invoked
        userSessionKey: - Secretkey made using the User Session ID
        Returns:
        Map of decrypted data or null if input parameters are invalid. Returns the encData if the input encData is empty or null
        Throws:
        ResponseDecryptionException
        InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException
